source:
class NCCD_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='NCCD', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['DMCensusStudentWithDisabilityId'] = [
                                        ['SKCensusStudentWithDisabilityId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKCensusStudentWithDisabilityId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']                                                                   
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMDisabilityCategoryAdjustment'] = [
                                        ['SKDisabilityCategoryAdjustment', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKDisabilityCategoryAdjustment', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['DisabilityCategory', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LevelOfAdjustment', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']                                                                
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactCensusStudentWithDisability'] = [
                                        ['SKFactCensusStudentWithDisability', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCensusStudentWithDisabilityId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKDisabilityCategoryAdjustment', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['NumberOfStudents', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                             
                                        ]

                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMCensusStudentWithDisabilityId', self.schemas['DMCensusStudentWithDisabilityId'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKCensusStudentWithDisabilityId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMDisabilityCategoryAdjustment', self.schemas['DMDisabilityCategoryAdjustment'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKDisabilityCategoryAdjustment')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactCensusStudentWithDisability', self.schemas['DMFactCensusStudentWithDisability'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKFactCensusStudentWithDisability')



nccd_object = NCCD_object()
